refnamediv.refname: A formal charge field for Atom

refsect1.title: Proposal
refsect1.para: Add getFormalCharge() and setFormalCharge(double) to the Atom class. The get/setCharge() method is now used for partial atomic charges.

refsect1.title: Reason
refsect1.para: In 2D chemical structure editors it is quite common to have atoms labeled with its formal charge, like a O^-1 atom. Unlink the partials atomic charge which is available, this charge does not really exist on this atom.
